name: World Computer Exchange
description: Donated computers and technology equipment for educational and nonprofit use; includes multiple Bay Area drop-off locations
fullDescription: World Computer Exchange is a nonprofit that collects donated computers and distributes them to schools, libraries, and community organizations in developing countries and underserved US communities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Donated computers and technology equipment
- Equipment for educational and nonprofit use
- Multiple Bay Area drop-off locations for donations
- Computers refurbished and distributed to those in need
howToGetIt:
1. Visit worldcomputerexchange.org
2. Complete the request form for your organization
3. Provide documentation of nonprofit or educational status
4. Coordinate pickup or delivery of equipment
